member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS
member.summary: Query information about graphics-pipeline activity in between calls to and .

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.IAVertices
member.summary: Number of vertices read by input assembler.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.IAPrimitives
member.summary: Number of primitives read by the input assembler. This number can be different depending on the primitive topology used. For example, a triangle strip with 6 vertices will produce 4 triangles, however a triangle list with 6 vertices will produce 2 triangles.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.VSInvocations
member.summary: Number of times a vertex shader was invoked. Direct3D invokes the vertex shader once per vertex.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.GSInvocations
member.summary: Number of times a geometry shader was invoked. When the geometry shader is set to NULL, this statistic may or may not increment depending on the hardware manufacturer.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.GSPrimitives
member.summary: Number of primitives output by a geometry shader.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.CInvocations
member.summary: Number of primitives that were sent to the rasterizer. When the rasterizer is disabled, this will not increment.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.CPrimitives
member.summary: Number of primitives that were rendered. This may be larger or smaller than CInvocations because after a primitive is clipped sometimes it is either broken up into more than one primitive or completely culled.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.PSInvocations
member.summary: Number of times a pixel shader was invoked.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.HSInvocations
member.summary: Number of times a hull shader was invoked.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.DSInvocations
member.summary: Number of times a domain shader was invoked.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DATA_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.CSInvocations
member.summary: Number of times a compute shader was invoked.
